neva
2017/KER/1229
SUNIL THOMAS, J.
Crl.M.C.No.195 of 2017
Dated this the 10 day of January, 2017
ORDER
The main grievance of the petitioner is that the
application for interim custody is not being considered and
disposed of by the learned magistrate. I find no reason as to why
the court below should delay the consideration of the application,
having regard to the fact that a vehicle is involved and each day's
delay may result in further deterioration of its value. Court below
shall take up the matter and dispose it of at the earliest.
Crl.M.C is disposed of as above.
Sd/-
SUNIL THOMAS
Judge
Sbna/10/1/17
True Copy /
P A to Judge
